description:
1️⃣ **General Rules:**
**• 1.1** - Use common courtesy and respect at all times when interacting with staff members.
**• 1.2** - Do not privately message staff or ping them, use the support ticket system instead.
**• 1.3** - Do not spam images, emojis, commands, or @mentions.
**• 1.4** - No revealing private information about any individual. Zero tolerance.
**• 1.5** - Do not publicly accuse other users/players of misconduct. Do it in a ticket instead.
**• 1.6** - No posting content related to piracy, cheats, cracks, or exploits along with NSFW.

2️⃣ **Account Rules:**
**• 2.1** - Multiple accounts are not permitted.
**• 2.2** - No ban or filter circumvention.
**• 2.3** - Overly offensive/super NSFW usernames or avatars are not allowed.
**• 2.4** - Conducting any kind of real-world economic activity on this server is strictly prohibited, and may result in the account responsible getting terminated.

3️⃣ **Advertisement Rules:**
**• 3.1** - Server advertisements are strictly prohibited.
**• 3.2** - YouTube, Twitch, and other streaming accounts are only to be shared in the <#842509324361924628> channel.

4️⃣ **Discord Bot Rules:**
**• 4.1** - No usage of bots outside of the related channels.
**• 4.2** - Any form of abuse of the bots is forbidden.
**• 4.3** - UserBots are strictly prohibited and will result in an instant ban.

**Note:**
Rules are subject to common sense. These rules are not comprehensive and the use of loopholes to violate the spirit of these rules is subject to enforcement.

*The following documents are upheld in this server within reason:*
• *[Discord Community Guidelines](https://dis.gd/guidelines)*
• *[Discord Terms of Service](https://dis.gd/terms)*

⚠️ To unlock the server channels, you need to **[give yourself a role.](https://discord.com/channels/625757527765811240/854372772771135538/855205119741657099)**
title: **Community Rules**
